hero_description: Prepare effectively for exams without stress with our platform of exams by years and courses, designed for medical students.
features_subtitle: Powerful tools to optimize your learning
feature_1_desc: A secure and reliable platform. Your data remains private.
feature_2_desc: Track your performance and evaluate your level among the best.
feature_3_desc: Listening to our users to constantly improve the platform.
feature_4_desc: Highlight what is important in your revisions.
feature_5_desc: Organize yourself effectively for your last-minute revisions.
feature_6_desc: Never lose your important thoughts and annotations again.
pricing_subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs
testimonial_1_content: WAFA helped me score 95% on my final exams. The explanations are incredibly detailed!
testimonial_2_content: The practice exams are so realistic. They prepared me perfectly for the actual exam.
testimonial_3_content: Amazing platform! The progress tracking keeps me motivated throughout my studies.
faq_1_answer: WAFA is an online exam preparation platform designed specifically for medical students. It offers thousands of practice questions, detailed explanations, and performance analytics.
faq_2_question: Do you offer a free trial?
faq_2_answer: Yes! We offer a 7-day free trial with access to all Pro features. No credit card required.
faq_3_question: Can I download questions for offline study?
faq_3_answer: Offline access is available with Pro and Premium plans. Download questions and study anywhere without internet.
faq_4_answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with your purchase. No questions asked.
contact_subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact_form_subtitle: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact_success_message: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
footer_brand_description: Your ultimate platform for exam preparation and success.
will_respond_soon: We will respond as soon as possible.
contact_description: Have a question? A technical issue? Our team is here to help. Send us a message and we will respond as soon as possible.
